text: Nestlé Brands Make Chocolate Using Certified Sustainable Cocoa
The following Canadian-produced treats use sustainable cocoa:
Nestlé in Canada is proud to source for its Canadian production purposes Rainforest Alliance certified sustainable cocoa, supplied through the Cocoa Plan.
Check specific product packaging, as it always discloses if the cocoa sourced comes fromthe Nestlé Cocoa Plan.
